titleStmt.title: Receipt in a sale of land
titleStmt.author: Athenarion

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: [.]fourth. ;In the ninth year of the Emperor Caesar Nerva Traianus Augustus Germanicus Dacicus, month Sebastos, 30, at Theadelphia of the Themistou meris of the Arsinoite nome. Athenarion [ ], aged about 32 years old with her guardian NN, a nephew from her father's family, aged about 33 years old, scar [ ] acknowledges to [Philippos, son of NN], aged about 33 years old, scar [ ] that neither Athenarion nor her assigns take action ] ... nor in the future will take action against Philippos ... [The following text is too fragmentary to translate]

listBibl.bibl: Westermann WL - Kraemer CJ, PCorn, 40, 1926 -- BL II 2, 50
